    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport
      Helper class, holding, for each row and filter (editor or user defined), a bit defining whether it is filtered in or out.
